title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. Need a width hint for the dialog.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives).

d. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

NOTES:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

e. 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.

f. Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.

g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f.

Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: When no selection is made, but the 'OK' button is enabled, 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.
EB: When no selection is made, the 'OK' button should be disabled or 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Make no selection.
3. Observe that the 'OK' button is enabled.
4. Click on 'Add'.
5. Verify that a hidden entry is not added to the associated editors list.
